title: The Family prince
creator_credit: Jeannine Locke and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: A candid look at the relevance and romance of the British monarchy from Prince Charles, Prince of Wales. Bridging the Prince’s frank, on-camera comments, the narrative script is combined with historical film footage to study the evolution of Crown and Commonwealth in modern times and to look at Charles’ younger years.
